content: Do you mean the font of the text in message bodies? Be specific, as there are ways to set the font of several elements, including the message list, folder pane, menus etc. For message bodies, there is a straightforward method based on userContent.css, but some users might not call it 'simple'.
creator: sfhowes

content:
This normally works: Exit Thunderbird if running. 

   click windows key and 'r' key    Enter: thunderbird.exe -P --allow-downgrade    click on 'OK'

Reminder: in settings>general, set update to not automatic.
creator: davidsk

content: Please provide more information. There is no server named imap.thunderbird.net. With more information, maybe we can assist. Thank you.

content:
• poslední přijatá zpráva, která je dole

Stačí si nastavit pořadí přijatých e-mailů opačně - nové nahoru. Stačí kliknout na Datum ve stejnojmenném sloupci přijatých zpráv. Zprávy se pak seřadí od nejnovějších.

"Naše rámečky" v Thunderbirdu žádné nemám, protože tohle je jenom fórum uživatelů. Autory lze možná kontaktovat na https://bugzilla.mozilla.org
creator: poljos-moz

content: Some have tried to do that by using cloud services, such as Dropbox, but it is problematic. Thunderbird was designed to run on the local PC. Your closest supported framework would be to use IMAP for accounts, and a shared online addressbook such as Google.
creator: davidsk

content: That appears to be something done by your Exchange account.
creator: davidsk

content: Is this a backup of a Thunderbird profile? Is it a zip file? If so, I suggest unzipping and use the tools>import>import from another thunderbird installation menu option.
creator: davidsk

content: Thunderbird is just a messenger. What has possibly changed are security requirements by your email provider. If you post screenshots of your incoming server settings and outgoing settings, some suggestions may surface. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: first, check your outgoing messages. Is there an attachment being inserted by an antivirus program, or similar attachment? You said 'often', so it would help to identify what is different for those that cause the error message. Contacting the email provider may also provide ideas.
creator: davidsk

content: You need to share much more information, such as - did your email ever work? - are you aware of any change that caused email to stop working? - can you provide screenshots of incoming and outgoing server settings? - can you post full content of any error messages?
creator: davidsk

content: I am not sure what you are wanting to delete. I infer (from Google Translate) that you want to delete the inbox, but I think that is incorrect. Please provide more information. Thank you.
creator: davidsk
